attributes.action: Investigate claims being made in at least four newpapers today claiming mass immigration in the last four years what intentionally done
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Labour's relaxation of controls was a deliberate plan to "open up the UK to mass migration"
As a result, the public argument for immigration concentrated instead on the economic benefits and need for more migrants.


If this was done intentionally to make the UK "multicultral" then people need to be prosecuted.
